author: GameSpot
description: Prepare for a deep dive on 007 First Light! During this special State of Play, the development team at IO Interactive declassifies new gameplay on James Bond’s upcoming espionage action-adventure thrill ride. Catch the show live on September 3 at 11am PT / 7pm BST / 8pm CEST.
title: 007 First Light - State of Play Gameplay Deep Dive Livestream

author: GameSpot
description:
Paramount Pictures is teaming up with Activision to make a Call of Duty movie. Will they pursue a Modern Warfare angle, or a Black Ops angle?

#callofduty #activision #gamespot
title: Paramount Is Making a Call of Duty Movie

author: GameSpot
description:
Blitzcrank is here to help. Play 2XKO’s newest champion in Closed Beta, starting September 9 on PC.

2XKO is a 2v2 fighting game where good teamwork can make the difference between victory and defeat. Master a variety of unique tag and assist mechanics to outplay the enemy duo and secure your spot at the top.



#2XKO #RiotGames
title: 2XKO - Blitzcrank Character Gameplay Reveal Trailer

author: GameSpot
description:
We played an hour of Final Fantasy Tactics and we were blown away by a number of gameplay improvements.

#gamespot #finalfantasy
title: Final Fantasy Tactics: The Ivalice Chronicles - What Impressed Us

author: GameSpot
description:
Jess got hands on with Final Fantasy Tactics - The Ivalice Chronicles at Gamescom 2025 for 1 hour and she's here to share her thoughts on the game. Her biggest takeaways were that the voice acting was phenomenal, the vast array of optimization and accessibility options, the improved visuals that are not polished to an uncanny degree, and it has just enough changes to keep veteran players on their toes while retaining what made the original game a master piece. 

#fftactics  #finalfantasytactics  #gaming 

Credits: 
Host Jessica Cogswell
Camera Max Blumenthal
title: Final Fantasy Tactics - The Ivalice Chronicles Hands on Impressions
